docs.snippet: After seeing the new National September 11 Memorial Museum, one victim's widow decided to donate one of her husband's FDNY paramedic shirts, karate uniforms and beloved baseball jersey....
docs.lead_paragraph: After seeing the new National September 11 Memorial Museum, one victim's widow decided to donate one of her husband's FDNY paramedic shirts, karate uniforms and beloved baseball jersey.

headline.main: Now Open, 9/11 Museum Sees Influx of New Artifacts
headline.print_headline: Now Open, 9/11 Museum Sees Influx of New Artifacts

docs.snippet: In a region that is practically religious about sports, remarks made by Bruce Levenson — co-owner of the Atlanta Hawks — have become touchstones for larger questions about the city’s identity....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a region that is practically religious about sports, remarks made by Bruce Levenson — co-owner of the Atlanta Hawks — have become touchstones for larger questions about the city’s identity.
docs.abstract: Racially tinged email by Atlanta Hawks owner Bruce Levenson has become latest flap in which sports have become charged touchstone for larger question of Atlanta's identity.

headline.seo: Hawks’ Owner Bruce Levenson’s Comments Underscore Atlanta’s Racial Unease
headline.main: In Atlanta, Debating Race and Sports
headline.print_headline: In Atlanta, Debating Race and Sports
